title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 57.6 - Right to court review
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 57.6 - Right to court review

State Regulations

Nothing in this Part shall affect any right of the patient or
someone acting on his behalf to initiate a proceeding allowed to him by law
before a court of competent jurisdiction to challenge his transfer to or
retention at Mid-Hudson Forensic Psychiatric Center, Kirby Forensic Psychiatric

Center, Rochester Regional Forensic Unit or Northeast Regional Forensic

Unit. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
57.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
